parameters.description: use disruptions valid after this date
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: use disruptions valid before this date
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: If filled, will restrain the search within the given disruption tags
parameters.name: tags[]

parameters.description: use disruptions valid after this date
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: use disruptions valid before this date
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: If filled, will restrain the search within the given disruption tags
parameters.name: tags[]

parameters.description: First part of the uri, Ex: {uri} = lines/line:IDFM:C01374 (Metro 4) or  {uri} = physical_modes/physical_mode:RapidTransit (RER)
parameters.name: uri

status.description: Status from the whole journey taking into account the most disturbing information retrieved on every object used (can be "NO_SERVICE", "SIGNIFICANT_DELAYS", ...

nb_transfers.description: Number of transfers along the journey

arrival_date_time.description: Arrival date and time of the journey

departure_date_time.description: Departure date and time of the journey

type.description: Used to qualify the journey (can be "best", "comfort", "non_pt_walk", ...

timezone.description: Timezone of any datetime in the response, default value Africa/Abidjan (UTC)

current_datetime.description: The datetime of the request (considered as "now")

distance.description: Distance to the object in meters

start_validation_date.description: Start of the validity period for the dataset

end_validation_date.description: End of the validity period for the dataset

arrival_date_time.description: Arrival date and time of the section

departure_date_time.description: Departure date and time of the section

base_arrival_date_time.description: Base-schedule arrival date and time of the section

base_departure_date_time.description: Base-schedule departure date and time of the section

distance.description: Distance to the object in meters

taxi.description: Total duration by taxi of the journey (seconds)

walking.description: Total walking duration of the journey (seconds)

car.description: Total duration by car of the journey (seconds)

ridesharing.description: Total duration by ridesharing of the journey (seconds)

bike.description: Total duration by bike of the journey (seconds)

taxi.description: Total distance by taxi of the journey (meters)

car.description: Total distance by car of the journey (meters)

walking.description: Total walking distance of the journey (meters)

bike.description: Total distance by bike of the journey (meters)

ridesharing.description: Total distance by ridesharing of the journey (meters)

label.description:
Label of the stop area. The name is directly taken from the data whereas the label is
 something we compute for better traveler information. If you don't know what to display, display the label.

start_production_date.description: Beginning of the production period. We only have data on this production period

shape.description: GeoJSON of the shape of the coverage

end_production_date.description: End of the production period. We only have data on this production period

last_load_at.description: Datetime of the last data loading

info.title: Calculateur Vianavigo - Accès générique (Navitia)
info.description:
navitia.io is the open API for building cool stuff with mobility data. It provides the following services

    * journeys computation
    * line schedules
    * next departures
    * exploration of public transport data / search places
    * and sexy things such as isochrones

    navitia is a HATEOAS API that returns JSON formated results
